prompts: /meta Analyze the docs/command and the docs skills I want to add different types of documentation, such as how to guides for a given topic, but this may involve a new workflow, so I was wondering if it would be smart to keep that one/command/docs, new or/docs how to and create different skills for the different documentation types and workflowsOr if we could just add it all to one documentation skill what is the best practice?
okay plan how we can refactor the docs skills so that it can support different workflows / orchestrations gracefully and modularly.
i like this plan, proceed with it but FIRST duplicate the current docs skills to called docs-v2 and then proceed on v2 so that it's easy to rollback if necessary.
